compliance.age_requirement: Varies by province (typically 19+, 18+ in AB, MB, QC)
compliance.affiliate_disclosure: Required in introduction (50-75 words standard TES format)

key_reminders: DirectionBet is NOT a top-tier sportsbook - manage expectations
Highlight unique features: hybrid platform, crypto payments, bonus amount
Compare frequently to Sports Interaction, bet365, TonyBet for context
Target audience: crypto users, casino+sports players, alternative explorers
40x bonus wagering is significant weakness - explain importance vs 3-10x industry standard
Official sources critical due to minimal online presence
Canada-specific: provincial licensing, age by province, CAD currency
Must hit 3,500-4,000 word count for competitive content
writer_notes.tone: Objective, informative, comparative, honest about positioning
avoid: Dated language in H1 (use Last Updated badge)
